config.speed.tooltip: How fast to transition between colors
config.fade.tooltip: Whether to fade between colors or switch abruptly
config.install-gmcm-options: If you install the GMCM Options mod then you will see the color palette rendered here.
message.install-gmcm-options: For full functionality of the configuration menu, install the GMCM Options mod (https://www.nexusmods.com/stardewvalley/mods/10505)
palette.prismatic.name: Prismatic
palette.conflict: Mod {{modName}} attempted to add a color palette with id {{id}}, but a color palette with that id was already added by {{conflictingModName}}.
palette.no-colors: Mod {{modName}} attempted to add color palette "{{paletteName}}" (id {{id}}) with no colors.
status.added-content-pack: Added {{numAdded}} color palettes from content pack {{name}}
content-pack.palettes.error:
Error reading palettes.json in content pack {{cpName}}; ignoring.  Details: 
{{details}}
content-pack.palettes.missing: Content pack {{cpName}} does not contain a palettes.json; ignoring.
content-pack.palettes.format-missing: The palettes.json in content pack {{cpName}} is missing the FormatVersion field; ignoring.
content-pack.palettes.new-minor-format: The FormatVersion in palettes.json in content pack {{cpName}} ({{cpFormatVersion}}) is newer than the format version supported by {{modName}} ({{modFormatVersion}}).  It has the same major version, so everything should work fine.
content-pack.palettes.new-major-format: The FormatVersion in palettes.json in content pack {{cpName}} ({{cpFormatVersion}}) is newer than the format version supported by {{modName}} ({{modFormatVersion}}).  It has a different major version; things might not work.
content-pack.palette.missing-id: In content pack {{cpName}} palettes.json, palette at index {{paletteIndex}} is missing the required Id property; ignoring.
content-pack.palette.missing-colors: In content pack {{cpName}} palettes.json, palette {{paletteName}} is missing the Colors property; ignoring.
content-pack.palettes.read-1: Read one palette from content pack {{cpName}}.
